paper_abstract: In "Barwick and Jackson (Finite Fields Appl. 18:93-107 2012)", the authors determine the representation of Order-q-subplanes s and order-q-sublines of PG(2, q (3)) in the Bruck-Bose representation in PG(6, q). In particular, they showed that an Order-q-subplanes of PG(2, q (3)) corresponds to a certain ruled surface in PG(6, q). In this article we show that the converse holds, namely that any ruled surface satisfying the required properties corresponds to a tangent Order-q-subplanes of PG(2, q (3)).
paper_title: A characterisation of tangent subplanes of PG(2, q (3))
